tuv.seg: Since January 1995, parents of a stillborn child in Ireland have been able to register their child's birth, even if he/she was born before that date
Ó Eanáir 1995 i leith, tá ar chumas tuismitheoirí le leanbh marbh-bhreithe breith a linbh a chlárú, fiú má rugadh é/í roimh an dáta sin
If you wish to register the stillbirth, you should go and sign the Stillbirths Register at the office of the Registrar of Births, Marriages and Deaths in any district

Más mian leat an mharbh-bhreith a chlárú, ba cheart duit cuairt a thabhairt ar oifig Chláraitheoir na mBreitheanna, na bPóstaí agus na mBásanna in aon limistéar agus Clár na Marbh-Bhreitheanna a shíniú

(Before the relevant provisions of the Civil Registration Act 2004 came into effect on 5 December 2005, a stillbirth could only be registered in the Registrar's District in which it took place.) You must provide written evidence of the stillbirth

(Sular tháinig forálacha ábhartha an Achta um Chlárú Sibhialta, 2004 i bhfeidhm an 5 Nollaig 2005, ní fhéadfaí marbh-bhreith a chlárú ach i Limistéar an Chláraitheora ina thit sí amach.) Caithfidh tú fianaise scríofa a sholáthar i leith na marbh-bhreithe
The registrar will give you a certificate of stillbirth at the time of signing
Tabharfaidh an cláraitheoir deimhniú marbh-bhreithe duit ag tráth an tsínithe
If you would like a certificate at a later date, you should contact the General Register Office
Más mian leat deimhniú a fháil ag dáta níos déanaí, ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an bPríomh-Oifig Chlárúcháin
All stillbirths occurring in Ireland since 1 January 1995 must be registered, if the baby weighs at least 500 grammes or has a gestational age of at least 24 weeks

Ní go mbíonn gach marbh-bhreith a tharlaíonn in Éirinn ón 1 Eanáir 1998 i leith a bheith cláraithe, má bhíonn an leanbh 500 gram, ar a laghad, ar meáchan, nó má bhíonn aois iompair 24 seachtain, ar a laghad, ag an leanbh
You (the parents) can choose to register the stillbirth yourselves, but if you are unable to do so, you may ask a relative of either parent to act as qualified informant to register it on your behalf

Féadfaidh tú (na tuismitheoirí) a roghnú chun an mharbh-bhreith a clárú sibh féin, ach mura féidir leat amhlaidh a dhéanamh, féadfaidh tú iarraidh ar ghaol le ceachtar tuismitheoir chun gníomhú mar fhaisnéiseoir cáilithe chun í a chlárú thar do cheann
If a stillbirth is not registered within 12 months, the hospital, midwife or medical practitioner who attended the birth may be asked to register it
Mura gcláraítear marbh-bhreith laistigh de 12 mhí, féadtar iarraidh ar an ospidéal, an bhean chabhrach nó an cleachtóir leighis a d’fhreastail ar an mbreith í a chlárú

If you do wish to register the stillbirth yourselves, the medical practitioner who attended the birth or examined the baby must give you a signed medical certificate stating the baby's weight and gestational age, and the name and address of the hospital or other institution where the stillbirth took place

Más mian leat an mharbh-bhreith a chlárú sibh féin, ní mór don chleachtóir leighis a d’fhreastail ar an mbreith nó a scrúdaigh an leanbh deimhniú sínithe leighis a thabhairt duit ina luaitear meáchan agus aois iompair an linbh, agus ainm agus seoladh an ospidéil nó na hinstitiúide eile inar thit an mharbh-bhreith amach
If you wish to register a stillbirth that happened before 1 January 1995, you can do so at any time
Más mian leat marbh-bhreith a chlárú a tharla roimh an 1 Eanáir 1995, féadfaidh tú amhlaidh a dhéanamh ag aon tráth
You will need specific evidence to prove that a stillbirth occurred
Teastóidh fianaise shonrach uait lena chruthú gur thit marbh-bhreith amach
This evidence could be an authoritative written statement from your hospital, nursing home, medical practitioner or midwife, but the registrar may accept other forms of evidence
D’fhéadfadh ráiteas scríofa údarásach ó d’ospidéal, teach altranais, cleachtóir leighis nó bean chabhrach a bheith i gceist leis seo, ach féadfaidh an cláraitheoir glacadh le foirmeacha fianaise eile
Again, the stillbirth can only be registered if the baby weighed at least 500 grammes or had a gestational age of at least 24 weeks
Arís eile, ní féidir an mharbh-bhreith a chlárú má bhí an leanbh 500 gram, ar a laghad, ar meáchan nó má bhí aois iompair 24 seachtain, ar a laghad, ag an leanbh
If your baby was stillborn in hospital, the hospital staff will usually help you to complete a Birth Notification Form (Form BNF/01)
Má rugadh do leanbh marbh in ospidéal, is gnách go gcabhróidh foireann an ospidéil leat chun Foirm um Fhógra Breithe (Foirm BNF/01) a chomhlánú
In the case of a home birth, the midwife or doctor will do this
I gcás breithe sa bhaile, déanfaidh an bhean chabhrach nó an dochtúir é seo
The form outlines the information to be recorded in the Register of Stillbirths
Tugtar cuntas san fhoirm ar an bhfaisnéis atá le cur i dtaifead ar Chlár na mBreitheanna
This form will be forwarded to a registration office to inform the registrar that the stillbirth has occurred
Seolfar an fhoirm seo ar aghaidh go dtí oifig chlárúcháin chun an cláraitheoir a chur ar an eolas gur tharla an mharbh-bhreith
The registration process will only be complete when the parent(s) or other qualified informant attends the registrar's office in person and signs the Stillbirths Register

Ní bheidh an próiseas clárúcháin críochnaithe ach i ndiaidh go bhfreastalaíonn an tuismitheoir/na tuismitheoirí nó faisnéiseoir cáilithe eile ar oifig an chláraitheora i bpearsan agus i ndiaidh dóibh Clár na Marbh-Bhreitheanna a shíniú
The following information is recorded in the Register of Stillbirths:
Cuirtear an fhaisnéis a leanas i dtaifead ar Chlár na Marbh-Bhreitheanna:
• Time, date and place of birth of the child
• Am, dáta agus áit bhreithe an linbh
• The child's weight and gestational age
• Meáchan agus aois iompair an linbh
• The child's Personal Public Service number (PPSN) (this will be allocated at registration)
• Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí (UPSP) an linbh (leithdháilfear seo ar chlárú)
• The child's forename(s) and surname
• Céadainm(neacha) agus sloinne an linbh
• The mother's forename(s) and surname
• Céadainm(neacha) agus sloinne na máthar
• The mother's birth surname
• Sloinne breithe na máthar
• Birth surname of the mother's mother
• Sloinne breithe mháthair na máthar
• All previously used surnames of the mother (if any)
• Gach sloinne na máthar a úsáideadh roimhe seo (más ann dóibh)
• The mother's normal address at the date of birth
• Gnáthsheoladh na máthar ag dáta na breithe
• The mother's date of birth
• Dáta breithe na máthar
• The mother's marital status
• Stádas pósta na máthar
• The mother's Personal Public Service number (PPSN)
• Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí na máthar (UPSP)
• Similar information is entered for the father
• Iontráiltear a mhacasamhail d’fhaisnéis don athair
A medical certificate of weight and gestational age is free of charge
Tá deimhniú leighis i leith meáchain agus aois iompair saor in aisce
Since 4 July 2016, a stillbirth certificate is free of charge (was €20)
Ón 4 Iúil 2016 i leith, tá deimhniú marbh-bhreithe saor in aisce (bhíodh costas €20 air)
Go to the office of the Registrar of Births, Marriages and Deaths in any district and sign the Stillbirths Register. Bring written evidence of the stillbirth with you
Téigh go dtí oifig Chláraitheoir na mBreitheanna, na bPóstaí agus na mBásanna in aon limistéar agus sínigh Clár na Marbh-Bhreitheanna
View contact details of local registrars of births, marriages and deaths
Caithfidh tú fianaise scríofa a thabhairt leat i leith na marbh-bhreithe
A list of local registrars is also available from the General Register Office
Féach ar shonraí teagmhála cláraitheoirí breitheanna, póstaí agus básanna áitiúla Tá fáil ar liosta de chláraitheoirí áitiúla ón bPríomh-Oifig Chlárúcháin
